main.title: Welcome to STATService v3!
main.subtitle: STATService is a suite of software components for statististical analysis. Currently it comprises of:

components.Web app: This web portal, that allows you to perform statistical analysis directly online, and download all the components of the suite.
components.API: A set of XML web services, that allows the programmatic use of statistical tests from nearly any programming language and plattform.
components.EXCEL plugin: A set of plugins that allows to integrate statitical analysis in your favourite programs. Currently we have plugins for Excel 2010 and Excel 2007.

logged.message: You are logged in as user "{{username}}".
